name: dust collector production, electrostatic precipitator, for industrial use | dust collector, electrostatic precipitator, for industrial use | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4364/documentation

This dataset represent the production and the disposal of an electrostatic precipitator for industrial use, dimensioned to be connected to a wood furnace with capacity between 500 and 1000kW. Its air flow capacity is 1100 litres per second. Is modeled from an electrostatic precipitator for biomass burning but it could be used as a dust collector for other industrial processes (exaust after-treatment) with a compatible capacity.

From reception of furnace components at the factory gate

This activity ends with the disposal of the device in the end of its lifetime.The dataset includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the electrostatic precipitator (ESP) for industrial use: steel, stainless steel, copper, aluminium, mineral wool, plastics. The dataset includes energy required for the construction and the disposal of the device. The dataset doesnt include the basement in concrete for its installation.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Could be used for central European conditions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Typical electrostatic precipitator for particulate matter collection from wood boilers. This device is dimensioned to be applied in conjunction with a wood furnace with 1000kW thermal capacity.  ;Source image: http://www.gmefilter.ch/2011D.pdf (modified)
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: literature, personal communications from technicians and producers, technical data available
